scenario_text.value: What the...? Th-this is...
Heyyy, lemme see it, Takumaaa!

Huh? Wait, hold up. Where did all this come
from...?

Eesh... What is this! This whole place is
covered in sticky white threads!

(Whoa, spiderwebs suddenly appeared all over!
What in the world...?)

Remain vigilant, everyone... I still sense
our mysterious friend nearby.

Oh boy, oh jeez... Takuma, my man, let’s make
like a bread truck and haul buns!
Uwaaah!!!
Yeep!

EeeYOW!!! Damn, Ryo, stop screaming like that
outta nowhere! You scared me silly!
Huh? Wait...where’s Aoi?
Aoi? Aoi, where are you?! Answer meee!
Huh? What’s wrong, Labramon?

It’s Aoi, she’s gone! This can’t be
happening. AOIII!
Aoi’s missing?!
But she was here just a second ago!
Gadzooks! So sudden...!
Ah, ahhh... It was the monster...
The...monster?

Yeah, yeah that’s right... She was abducted
by that mysterious monster! Honest!

It all happened in the blink of an eye, but
I saw it snatch her and disappear...
I saw it! I saw it, I tell ya!

Hey, Agumon... Is the thing that made off
with Aoi a creature like you guys?

Yeah! But it was too fast for me to see who
it was.

No way! I didn’t notice it at all!
What’ll we do if it attacks us that fast?!

This is just like with the Gottsumon... Let’s
assume this thing is stronger than it looks.

The camera’s picking up spiderwebs, right?
That’d mean we’re trapped in one big nest...
You think...we’re gonna b-be its next meal?

No! HELL no!!! I ain’t goin’ down like that!
I- I want my mommy!

The moment I felt an unpleasant presence, it
had already made off with Aoi. Forgive me.

I should’ve paid more attention to our
surroundings... I’m so sorry, Takuma.

Ohhh, and after we finally got to meet...
and she even fixed me up...
Aoi... Oh, Aoi...
I’m sorry, Labramon...

(Everyone is so scared and confused. Even me,
I can’t get my head straight.)
...What’re we gonna do, Takuma?

I’ll tell you what we’re gonna do! Get the
hell out of here, of course!

What’re you saying?! You just wanna up and
leave Aoi in the lurch?!

It ain’t like we’ll catch up if we chase
it...

That isn’t a foregone conclusion. Still, what
should we do now?
Anyway, Aoi’s in trouble!
We all have to split up and look for her!

(I’m worried about Aoi too, but are we gonna
explore the den of an unseen enemy?)

(But Aoi must be just as scared, if not more
so. We’ve gotta do something...)
(Dammit, what should we do?!)
Hurry up and save Aoi!
Exercise some caution.
Okay, we’ll all split up and find her!
You got it, Takuma!
Yeah! Let’s go, Falcomon!
Yes, sir!
Are you guys for real?!

Thank you all! Okay, let’s all go our
separate ways!
Hmm, I dunno. Splitting up sounds dangerous.

That’s what I’m saying! What if one of us
gets snatched?! We should stick together!
But we can cover more ground that way, right?

Indubitably. Worry not, we’ll be right beside
you.
Yeah, let’s split into groups!

I’ll go on ahead! Thanks for your help,
everyone!
Let’s go too, Takuma!
Yeah! We’ll get <color=#B41919>Aoi</color> back for sure!
